mapper.select: SELECT name as tech_name_input FROM techname where upper (name) LIKE '%'|| upper(#{tech_name_input})||'%'
SELECT pno, project_name, project_term1, project_term2, project_tech_name as techstack FROM pr_project where email=#{email} order by project_term1 asc
mapper.update: UPDATE pr_project SET project_name=#{project_name}, project_content=#{project_content}, project_term1=#{project_term1}, project_term2=#{project_term2}, project_tech_name=#{techstack}, project_grade=#{project_grade} WHERE pno=#{pno}
